metadata.inclusion:
1. Hold down the top of the paddle for 7 seconds until the LED blinks amber
2. Tap the top of the paddle one time
3. The LED will flash green and then blink 3 times upon successful inclusion
metadata.exclusion:
1. Hold down the top of the paddle for 7 seconds until the LED blinks amber
2. Tap the top of the paddle one time
3. The LED will flash green and then blink 3 times upon successful exclusion
metadata.reset: Hold the top of the paddle down for 14 seconds. The LED will blink red/amber upon successful reset.
